thematic 0.1.0.9000
  • Auto theming

  • Reference

Reference

Enable (or disable) thematic

thematic_on() thematic_off() thematic_theme() thematic_shiny() thematic_rmd()

Enable (or disable) simplified theming of R graphics.

Customize fonts and colorscales

font_spec()

Font specification

sequential_gradient()

Control parameters of the sequential colorscale

okabe_ito()

A color-blind safe qualitative colorscale (Okabe-Ito)

Configure resolution of auto values

auto_config() auto_config_set() auto_config_get()

Configure auto theming behavior

auto_resolve_theme()

Resolve auto values

Manage global state

thematic_with_theme() thematic_local_theme() thematic_set_theme() thematic_get_theme() thematic_get_option() thematic_get_mixture()

Tools for getting and restoring global state

Save plots to a file

thematic_save_plot() default_device()

Capture a thematic plot as a saved file

Manage the font cache location

font_cache_set()

Control the directory used for font caching
